mapper.select:
SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=DS.BRDNO) FILECNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=DS.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT FROM ( SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDDATE, BRDHIT , BRDDELETEFLAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BRDNO DESC) BRDNO_SEQ FROM TBL_BOARD
) DS WHERE BRDNO_SEQ BETWEEN ${rowStart} AND ${rowEnd} ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT BRDNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{brdno}, #{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, SYSDATE, 0, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') BRDDATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno}
SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILE (BRDNO, FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (#{parentPK}, FILENO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, RENO, REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, REDATE, REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REORDER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=#{reparent} AND RENO!=#{reparent} AND REDELETEFLAG='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR1 INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR2 ON TBR2.BRDNO=TBR1.BRDNO AND TBR1.REORDER >TBR2.REORDER AND TBR1.REDELETEFLAG='N' SET TBR1.REORDER = TBR1.REORDER - 1 WHERE TBR2.RENO=#{reno}
